head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WEISS, SIDNEY MATTHEW

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WEISS, SIDNEY MATTHEW

block.p: WEISS-Sidney Matthew, 91. Died early on Monday at Greenwich Hospital, Greenwich, Connecticut, after a brief illness. A pioneer advertising executive, Mr. Weiss is survived by his devoted wife Sylvia and son Charles, both of Greenwich. He is also survived by a sister, Selma Bettin of La Jolla, California. Burial will be private. In lieu of flowers, memorial donations may be made to Greenwich Hospital, Greenwich, CT.
